meta.name: description
meta.content: Located in Wilmington, Delaware the mission of the Delaware Military Academy is to prepare young men and women for their next level of education and to provide them with a foundation that leads to good citizenship.

div.span: THE DELAWARE MILITARY ACADEMY IS AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER. IT DOES NOT DISCRIMINATE ON THE BASIS OF RACE, COLOR,
RELIGION, NATIONAL ORIGIN, SEX, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, GENDER IDENTITY, MARITAL STATUS, DISABILITY, AGE, GENETIC INFORMATION,
HOUSING/HOMELESS STATUS OR VETERAN STATUS IN EMPLOYMENT, OR ITS PROGRAMS AND ACTIVITIES.

img.alt: We are replacing the REMIND Alert System! Click here to download the BAND App and get alerts for school closings, weather alerts, and more!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 112 Middleboro Road Wilmington, DE 19804 Phone: (302) 998-0745 Fax: (302) 998-3521 School Hours: 7:25 am to 2:35 pm Office Hours: 7:00 am to 3:15 pm

div.span: Due to the global pandemic of COVID19 and the
uncertainty regarding when the Declaration of a
State of Emergency will be lifted, the 2020 DMA
Sports Camp scheduled for June 22nd – June 26th
is cancelled. We are looking forward to provide
members of our community a rewarding
experience at DMA Sports Camps in the future.
